parameters.query:
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.session_token,
  s.user_id,
  s.company_id,
  s.role,
  s.expires_at,
  s.last_activity_at,
  u.telegram_id,
  u.first_name,
  u.last_name,
  u.username,
  c.name as company_name
FROM sessions s
JOIN users u ON u.id = s.user_id
LEFT JOIN companies c ON c.id = s.company_id
WHERE s.session_token = '{{ $json.token }}' AND s.is_active = true

UPDATE sessions 
SET last_activity_at = NOW(),
    expires_at = CASE 
      WHEN expires_at - NOW() < INTERVAL '2 days' 
      THEN NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days'
      ELSE expires_at
    END
WHERE session_token = '{{ $json.session_token }}'
RETURNING expires_at
